description:
Located in Cherry Hill, New Jersey, the law firm of Leon Aussprung provides exceptional and effective legal counsel and support to those who suffered an injury or loss as the result of someone else's negligent, careless or unlawful actions. Based in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, the firm's growth lends credence to the level of success its attorneys have achieved helping clients across the region obtain the favorable outcomes they expect and deserve for any of the following legal challenges:

• Medical malpractice
• Product liability
• Premises liability
• Auto and trucking accidents
• Construction and workplace accidents

A board-certified physician himself, attorney Leon Aussprung has considerable medical experience. He uses this knowledge to better address the medical aspects of his clients' claims in order to devise the most effective strategies possible to help them recover the full amount of compensation they deserve. To date, the law firm's attorneys have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for their plaintiff clients, including numerous multimillion-dollar awards.

While the firm's attorneys can make no guarantees regarding your claim, they do promise to fight hard to protect your rights, preserve your entitlements and improve the likelihood you will receive the maximum amount of finances you need during this difficult and stressful time in your life.

To begin the process of exploring your options following a preventable tragedy that has greatly impacted your life and family, you can contact the law firm of Leon Aussprung by calling the office or visiting the website to receive a free evaluation of your claim. Moreover, the firm also offers virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
